crossdisplay.h File Reference

Defines CrossDisplay-specific public functions on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms. More...

Detailed Description

Defines CrossDisplay-specific public functions on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms.
